column4: hi, how to add a new command to the options that pop up when you click on a file with the right mouse button (want to add command to enqueue music file in totem)?
right click -> open with -> open with other -> at the bottom, there's "use custom command"
thanks:)
you can modify your new user to use that directory
how?

ah you want to mvoe the files not just use teh old directory?
or just rename the directory to match your new name?

any help?
cp -R /home/oldname/* /home/newname/
or "mv" instead of "cp -R"
then "sudo chown -R newname:newname /home/newname/*"

access-your-private data.desktop and readme.txt
OH its encrypted?
try "su olduser -" in a terminal to force that directory to be decrypted?
user does not exist

so your encryption key from the old user is....? where?
